news.title: ‘You can only imagine the knock on the door for those families’ – five young friends die in nation’s worst road tragedy for 15 years
news.summary: Five young friends died and three others were left injured after a horrific two-car collision that left one vehicle engulfed in flames.

news.title: Dominik Szoboszlai’s tetchy interview and disrespecting Troy Parrott: Hungarian civil war after shock loss to Ireland
news.summary: Supporters and the media in Hungary have turned on the team and their manager, Marco Rossi, as they woke up to the fact that their World Cup dream is over.

news.title: Sinn Féin politician knew about criminal past of party activist now suspected of far-right extremism
news.summary: A Sinn Féin senator was aware of the criminal convictions of a supporter who is now a terror suspect in a far-right plot to attack a mosque.

news.title: Wicklow woman who drowned on Saturday was trying to save her family pet
news.summary: The woman who tragically drowned on Saturday in Wicklow has been named as Herbst Software director Wendy Maxine Herbst of Kilpoole Hill Farm, the home of Polo Wicklow.

news.title: Newstalk’s Joe Lynam: I had reflux and stiffness in my right arm. Ciara Kelly told me to go straight to hospital. It was a heart attack
news.summary: Up to three weeks ago, Newstalk business editor and presenter, Joe Lynam, was living an active lifestyle that incorporated his love of walking, hiking, cycling and swimming in the Irish Sea.

news.title: ‘Fraudsters stole €2,400 from my Revolut account while I was asleep – but they still told me I must have authorised it myself’
news.summary: A father who had €2,400 stolen from his Revolut account has criticised the “frustrating” experience he had trying to get a refund.

news.title: Consumers to cut back on Black Friday and Cyber Monday spending as most think it’s overrated, says survey
news.summary: Consumers are set to cut back on their spending in the upcoming Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales.

news.title: I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! review: No local interest for the Irish yet but the show wisely goes back to basics
news.summary: The BBC may be run these days by woke activists prepared to trash the corporation’s hard won reputation just to score a few points over their ideological enemies on the right, but at least there are no ads.

news.title: The supermarket cream cheese taste test: From a ‘tangy and delicious’ hit to an ‘inoffensive but pricey’ miss
news.summary: Cream cheese is a handy staple, given that it can be used to rustle up a quick snack with crackers, be spread on a bagel for something more substantial, and used to make dips and spreads. It also has multiple uses in both sweet and savoury cooking.

news.title: The Indo Daily: Troubled Waters Ep 1 – ‘They’re messing with his head’: Paul Kimmage’s journey inside the toxic world of Irish rowing’s High Performance Unit
news.summary: Irish rowing has delivered some of the country’s greatest sporting moments. But behind the medals and headlines, troubling questions have emerged about the environment within the High Performance Unit.
